home.title: First steps
home.subtitle: Let's do it!
home.description: Congratulations! If you are here it is because you have made a (good) choice: to embark on the adventure of 3D printing. We will support you step by step, from the assembling to the first use of your machine or your new components. Are you ready to come onboard?
